data_table.description: Clinical Dementia Rating Summary, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS1
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q1. Memory [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS2
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q2. Orientation [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS3
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q3. Judgment and problem solving [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS4
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q4. Community affairs [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS5
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q5. Home and hobbies [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS6
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q6. Personal care [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS7
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q7. Standard CDR sum of boxes [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS8
variable.description: Section 1: Standard CDR. Q8. Standard global CDR [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS9
variable.description: Section 2: Supplemental CDR. Q9. Behavior and personality [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS10
variable.description: Section 2: Supplemental CDR. Q10. Language [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS11
variable.description: Section 2: Supplemental CDR. Q11. Supplemental CDR sum [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS12
variable.description: Section 2: Supplemental CDR. Q12. Std and supplemental CDR sum of boxes [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]

variable.name: CDS0AY
variable.description: Year of completion date [Clinical Dementia Rating Summary]
